agrar.io.controller

Class DatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • agrar.io.controller.DatabaseAdapter

  • public class DatabaseAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functions to retrieve / send informations to the gloabl database
    Author:
    Matthias

    • Method Detail

      • getHighscores

        public Score[] getHighscores()
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get the 5 highest scoring players from the DB
        Returns:
        An array of 5 (or less) Score objects representing the highest scores
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(Score s)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if a password entered by a user is equal to the one stored in the database for the same name
        Parameters:
        s - the name / password to check
        Returns:
        true if the password is the same
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - When an exception occurs during the execution of the query

      • existsInDatabase

        public boolean existsInDatabase(Score s)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks if a given Score entry exits in the database (based on the primary key name)
        Parameters:
        s - the score to find in the database
        Returns:
        true if the score exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - When the query fails in some way

      • insert

        public void insert(Score s)
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   DatabaseAdapter.InvalidPasswordException
        Inserts a score into the database. If the score is already in the DB, does nothing
        Parameters:
        s - the score to insert
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        DatabaseAdapter.InvalidPasswordException - When the given password is invalid

      • update

        private void update(Score s)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Changes the score value for a player name. This method does not check if the password is valid!
        Parameters:
        s - The new score
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        (Re)establishes a connection to the database if necessary
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - When establishing a connection fails somehow

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Checks whether the connection is closed or timed out / invalid
        Returns:
        true if the connection is still usable

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects from the DB

      • getRandomPlayerName

        public java.lang.String getRandomPlayerName()
        Gets a random player name from the database of names
        Returns:
        a name for an ai player

      • getPlayerNames

        private java.lang.String[] getPlayerNames()
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get the list of player names from the DB
        Returns:
        a String[] array of player names
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
